landing.heroTitle:
Build, launch, and grow
with AI-Dala.
landing.heroSubtitle: CMS + AI search + secure auth in one powerful stack. Where ideas meet the steppe — and grow with AI.
landing.aboutText: AI-Dala is an AI-driven CMS and search platform that blends Next.js, Go APIs, and secure identity to help you build performant, discoverable experiences.
landing.authorText: AI-Dala is built by Volodymyr to bring AI-powered content management, search, and learning tools to creators across the Steppe and beyond.
landing.contactText: Stay updated on AI news, master-classes, and platform releases.

dashboard.subtitle: Your journey on the Steppe continues. Explore AI-powered content, manage your learning, and grow with AI-Dala.
dashboard.noteText: This is the initial dashboard layout. Specific features and widgets will be added in future requirements (REQ-007).

news.subtitle: Manage news articles

settings.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences

Settings.ManagePreferences: Manage your account preferences and settings
Settings.NotificationsDesc: Configure how and when you receive notifications about new content and updates.
Settings.AppearanceDesc: Customize the look and feel of your dashboard with themes and layouts.
Settings.PrivacyDesc: Control your privacy settings and data sharing preferences.
Settings.AnalyticsDesc: View your reading statistics and content engagement metrics.
